thread.title: Jessica Watts
thread.title_full: Smart Start, Inc. reviewed by Jessica Watts

author: Jessica Watts
title: Jessica Watts
text: Bobbie Is The Most Caring And Kindhearted Rep I've Ever Talked To On The Phone, I Called Completely Upset Almost In Tears And She Was Able To Help Comfort Me And Resure The Proper Help!. She Was Apologetic For Something She Didn't Do And Had No Control Over. Overall Her Spunky Personality Helped My Stress Levels Tremendously, If I Ever Have Any Questions Requesting For Her Assist Me Will Be The First Thing I Ask For. Thank You So Much Bobbie!.
